Provide keys to various useful generic ImportDecorators.

Method Detail

sticky

public static <S> ImportDecorator<S> sticky(Callable<Boolean> resetTask)
An ImportDecorator that caches the first valid service instance and uses that until it becomes invalid. The decorator then calls the reset task to see if it should reset, or throw ServiceUnavailableException.

NOTE: a sticky decorator only makes sense for "single" injected services.

Parameters:
resetTask - called when cached service becomes invalid, may be null
Returns:
decorator that caches service instances

chained

public static <S> ImportDecorator<S> chained(ImportDecorator<S>... decorators)
An ImportDecorator that combines several decorators in a chain.

Parameters:
decorators - sequence of decorators
Returns:
decorator that combines given decorators
